trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 表示可扩展性元素添加到 XML Web 服务。

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, the `ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension` class allows users to define extensibility elements in addition to those defined in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中，`ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension`类允许用户定义除 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 规范中定义的可扩展性元素。

trans-unit.source: Extensibility elements can be added to a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> at any of several levels within the class hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 可以将可扩展性元素添加到<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>在任何类层次结构中的多个级别。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: Thus many classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem> class (including the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class) have an `Extensions` property, which returns a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 因此许多类派生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem>类 (包括<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>类) 具有`Extensions`属性，它返回一种<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> class.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is used by the import process when the extensibility element is imported.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref>导入过程导入的扩展性元素时使用。

trans-unit.source: A derived class, representing an extensibility element added to an XML Web service, can be attached to a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> by using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.Import%2A> method (which is used by the wsdl.exe tool).
trans-unit.target: 派生的类，表示的扩展性元素添加到 XML Web 服务，可以附加到<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.Import%2A>方法 （这由 wsdl.exe 工具）。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.Import%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: You can also use a custom class derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionImporter> class to extend the import process to handle custom extensibility elements.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用自定义类派生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionImporter>类，以扩展以处理自定义的可扩展性元素导入进程。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionImporter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is used by the import process; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"> </xref> ; 否则为将使用通过导入过程<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the class returned by this property will be a derived class within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description> namespace rather than the base <xref:System.Object> class.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，此属性返回的类将是派生的类中<xref:System.Web.Services.Description>命名空间，而不是基的<xref:System.Object>类。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is necessary for the action to which it refers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref>对于所引用的操作是必需的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref>必需; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
